import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import{AppContext}from'../context/AppContext';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CurrencyComponent=()=>{const{currency,dispatch}=useContext(AppContext);const[selectedCurrency,setSelectedCurrency]=useState(currency);const handleCurrencyChange=event=>{setSelectedCurrency(event.target.value);dispatch({type:'CHG_CURRENCY',payload:event.target.value});};const currencyOptions=[{name:'Dollar',symbol:'$'},{name:'Pound',symbol:'€'},{name:'Euro',symbol:'£'},{name:'Ruppee',symbol:'¥'}// Add more currencies as needed
];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"alert alert-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Currency: ",currency]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:selectedCurrency,onChange:handleCurrencyChange,children:currencyOptions.map(option=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:option.symbol,children:option.name},option.symbol))})]});};export default CurrencyComponent;
